KnowledgeItem.Title: SupervisorInstallConfig
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for Installing Supervisor by writing into the MARS model and creating new corresponding data blocks in the Issue

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock SupervisorInstallConfig and the necessary information for successful completion of workflow

Activate.XMLExtract: <NewBlock><Tasks PKG=supervisor TargetMachine=${SIC:TargetMachine} TargetState=Created User=${SIC:User} Lib=PKG OSSpecific=Y Host=${SIC:Host} CurrentState=ReadState TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> </NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${SIC:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SIC:User}
				Lib=FILECREATE
				FilePath='${SIC:FilePath}'
				FileName=${SIC:FileName}
				FileContent='[program:${SIC:Program}] \ncommand=${SIC:ProgramFile} \nautostart=true \nautorestart=true \nstderr_logfile=/var/log/long.err.log \nstdout_logfile=/var/log/long.out.log'
				Host=${SIC:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${SIC:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SIC:User}
				Command='cd /etc/supervisor/conf.d && sudo supervisorctl reread'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Host=${SIC:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>

<NewBlock><Tasks 
				TargetMachine=${SIC:TargetMachine}      
				TargetState=Created
				User=${SIC:User}
				Command='cd /etc/supervisor/conf.d && sudo supervisorctl update'
				Lib=RUNCOMMAND
				Host=${SIC:Host}
				CurrentState=ReadState
				TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}/> 
				</NewBlock>
